TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Calendar extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 代表一个控件，此控件允许用户使用可视的日历显示来选择日期。

span.span: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个自身、 或下拉列表的一部分，可以使用控件控件。A control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 支持只有公历。The supports only the Gregorian calendar. 下表提供了通常与相关联的任务的信息。The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the . |任务Task|实现Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |具有显示每个月、 整整一年或十年。Have the display a month, an entire year, or a decade.|设置属性设置为月、 年或十年。Set the property to Month, Year, or Decade.| |指定用户是否可以选择一个日期、 一系列日期或多个范围的日期。Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.|使用。Use the .| |指定日期不能选择。Specify dates that cannot be selected.|使用 属性。Use the property.| |指定的日期范围的显示。Specify the range of dates that the displays.|使用和属性。Use the and properties.| |指定是否突出显示当前日期。Specify whether the current date is highlighted.|使用 属性。Use the property. 默认情况下是`true`。By default, is `true`.| |更改的大小。Change the size of the .|使用，或者设置属性设置为。Use a or set the property to a . 请注意，如果您设置并的属性，实际的日历不会更改其大小。Note that if you set the and properties of a , the actual calendar does not change its size.| 控件提供了使用鼠标或键盘的基本导航。The control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard. 下表总结了键盘导航。The following table summarizes keyboard navigation. |组合键Key Combination||操作Action| |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |箭头ARROW||更改属性如果属性未设置为。Changes the property if the property is not set to .| |箭头ARROW||更改的月份属性。Changes the month of the property. 请注意，不会更改。Note that the does not change.| |箭头ARROW||更改的年份。Changes the year of the . 请注意，不会更改。Note that the does not change.| |SHIFT + 箭头SHIFT+ARROW||如果未设置为或，扩展了所选日期范围。If is not set to or , extends the range of selected dates.| |HomeHOME||更改到当前月份的第一天。Changes the to the first day of the current month.| |HomeHOME||更改的月份到一年的第一个月。Changes the month of the to the first month of the year. 不会更改。The does not change.| |HomeHOME||更改的年份十年的第一年。Changes the year of the to the first year of the decade. 不会更改。The does not change.| |EndEND||更改到当前月份的最后一天。Changes the to the last day of the current month.| |EndEND||更改的月份年份的最后一个月。Changes the month of the to the last month of the year. 不会更改。The does not change.| |EndEND||更改的年份十年的最后一年。Changes the year of the to the last year of the decade. 不会更改。The does not change.| |Ctrl+向上键CTRL+UP ARROW|任意Any|切换到下一个更大。Switches to the next larger . 如果已经是，执行任何操作。If is already , no action.| |Ctrl+向下键CTRL+DOWN ARROW|任意Any|切换到下一个较小。Switches to the next smaller . 如果已经是，执行任何操作。If is already , no action.| |空格键或 ENTERSPACEBAR or ENTER| 或 or |开关到或由已设定焦点的项表示。Switches to the or represented by focused item.| ## 自定义日历控件Customizing the Calendar Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[Calendar 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Calendar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下图显示了两个控制，一个选择和中断日期，而无需另一个。The following illustration shows two controls, one with selections and blackout dates and one without. ![月历控件](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "月历控件")![Calendar controls](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "Calendar controls") 日历控件Calendar controls 下面的代码和 XAML 创建包含两个页面类似于上图的控件。The following code and XAML creates a page with two controls that is similar to the previous illustration. summary.span: 获取标记为不可选择的日期的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.

value.span: 不可选择的日期的集合。

span.span: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合中的日期将显示灰色并带删除线出日历上。Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar. 若要使过去的所有日期不可选，可以使用方法提供的此属性返回的集合。To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method provided by the collection returned by this property. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges**oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* 类型的一个或多个对象元素。One or more object elements of type . ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有某些不能选择的日期。The following example creates a that has some dates that cannot be selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![不能选择的日期的日历。](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "不能选择的日期的日历。")![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.") 不能选择的日期的日历Calendar with dates that cannot be selected

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the date to display.
The date to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性指定日历的显示内容和内容在日历中具有焦点。The and properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar. 用户可以更改仅当设置为 Month，但用户可能会更改日历时处于年和十年中的模式。The user can change the only when is set to Month, but the user might change the when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode. 下表描述了如何将模式更改。The following table describes how the mode changes the . |DisplayModeDisplayMode|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月份Month| 当用户导航到不同的月份的更改。 changes when the user navigates to a different month.| |年Year|月份的更改当用户单击或导航到不同的月份。The month of changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.| |十年Decade|年份更改当用户单击或导航到另一年。The year of changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.| 如果其值不在范围内的由指定的日期，则忽略和属性。 is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 在一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 以下代码中设置了与特定范围的可显示日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置日历中可用日期范围内的最后一个日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the last date in the date range that is available in the calendar.

value.span: 日历中最后一个可用日期。

span.span: The last date that is available in the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以限制的范围通过设置和属性。You can restrict the range of a by setting the and properties. 用户无法滚动到，或选择在此范围之外的日期。A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range. 如果您设置属性设置为晚的日期，设置为相同的值。If you set the property to a date that is after , is set to the same value as . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 在一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 以下代码中设置了与特定范围的可显示日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示日历是显示月份、年份还是十年期。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.

value.span: 一个指示 应显示的时间长度的值。

span.span: A value that indicates what length of time the should display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日历可以显示每个月、 年或十年。A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade. 下表列出了用户如何导航到每种模式。The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode. |DisplayModeDisplayMode|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月份Month|若要导航到年份模式下，单击月标题。To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.| |年Year|若要导航到十年模式，请单击年份标题。To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading. 若要导航到 Month 模式下，单击其中一个显示几个月。To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.| |十年Decade|若要导航到年份模式下，单击其中一个显示年。To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建日历显示月份中一年和句柄事件，以便当用户单击在上一个月或年，日历不会更改其。The following example creates a calendar that displays the months in a year and handles the event so that when the user clicks on a month or the year, the calendar does not change its . [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#4)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#4)] [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#5)]

summary.span: 当 属性更改时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例创建日历显示月份中一年和句柄事件，以便当用户单击在上一个月或年，日历不会更改其。The following example creates a calendar that displays the months in a year and handles the event so that when the user clicks on a month or the year, the calendar does not change its . span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 为在此控件有焦点的情况下用户按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法，以支持键盘导航。 overrides the method to support keyboard navigation. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据`true`击键，如按箭头键时执行导航操作。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.

para.span: 如果重写，均应调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 无法调用基实现可防止基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以调用基实现之前或之后应用特殊处理，具体取决于您的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

para.span: 您可以调用基实现之前或之后应用特殊处理，具体取决于您的要求。

The date currently selected.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| 使用此属性时设置为。Use this property when is set to . 在其他模式下，此属性将始终为中的第一个日期。In other modes, this property will always be the first date in . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 在一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的示例创建与特定范围的可显示日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。The following example creates a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedDates As SelectedDatesCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取选定日期的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of selected dates.

value.span: 包含当前选定日期的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the currently selected dates.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单独或在范围中使用日期可以添加到集合方法。Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the method. 具体取决于值属性，将日期或范围添加到集合可能导致其清除。Depending on the value of the property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared. 下表列出了如何影响属性。The following table lists how affects the property. |CalendarSelectionModeCalendarSelectionMode|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||不允许选定内容。No selections are allowed. 不能设置并且没有值可以添加到。 cannot be set and no values can be added to .| ||可以选择单个日期，通过设置中的第一个值或。Only a single date can be selected, either by setting or the first value in . 无法使用。 cannot be used.| ||只能选择一个日期范围。A single range of dates can be selected. 设置，单独对中添加日期，或使用将清除所有以前的值从。Setting , adding a date individually to , or using will clear all previous values from .| ||可以选择多个非连续范围的日期。Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected. 单独对中添加日期或使用不会清除。Adding a date individually to or using will not clear . 设置仍将清除，但然后可以添加其他日期或范围。Setting will still clear , but additional dates or ranges can then be added. 添加一系列，包括某些日期已选择或与另一个联合中的范围的范围结果重叠并不会导致异常。Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.| ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects**oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* 一个或多个对象元素。One or more object elements. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有多个所选日期范围。The following example creates a that has multiple ranges of dates selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)]
